location.description: Upstairs, first door to the right, there's a shelf next to the door
The shelf next to the living room couch
Huge pile of books hidden behind the couch
Bill Bailey's house - great friend, horrible book borrower

books.title: Les Furtifs

books.description: Sci-fi, mass surveillance and biological changes in answer to that

books.title: Semiosis
